extendedInfo.description: The spiritual nature of the Edgar Cayce readings promote a oneness of all life and inclusive philosophy that people have found inspiring for more than half a century. The very best âgolden nuggetsâ among these quotes from his readings have been included here in our âThought for the Dayâ app.Features:â¢A new thought for each day plus access to the last 7 days â¢The ability to share thoughts sociallyâ¢The ability to save and store your âfavoriteâ thoughts for future viewingâ¢Additional information about Edgar Cayce and his readings.Edgar Cayce has been called the âsleeping prophet,â the âfather of holistic medicine,â and the most documented psychic of the 20th century. For more than 40 years of his adult life, Cayce gave psychic âreadingsâ to thousands of seekers while in an unconscious state, diagnosing illnesses and revealing lives lived in the past and prophecies yet to come. In a state of relaxation and meditation, he was able to place his mind in contact with all time and spaceâthe universal consciousnessâalso known as the super-conscious mind. From there, he could respond to questions as broad as, âWhat are the secrets of the universe?â to âWhat is my purpose in life?â His responses to these questions came to be called âreadings,â and their insights offer practical help and advice to individuals even today.We hope youâll find this to be a useful tool for living an inspired life!
